about_the_game:
Step into the Sensual World of Succubus of Aphrodisia: Ako's First Embrace!

Embark on a horny journey through the medieval nation of Asteria following in the footsteps of Ako, a young succubus on her first mission to conquer the mortal realm. Along the way, Ako enlists the help of a cunning thief, uncovering the kingdom's secrets as she finds her footing in this unfamiliar land. With her alluring charm and seductive powers, Ako is determined to bring the kingdom of Asteria under the control of her coven mother, Aphrodisia.

Succubus of Aphrodisia: Ako's First Embrace is a visual novel featuring the succubus Ako as it's main character. Progressing through the story unlocks sex scenes, that can be revisited freely afterwards. Scenes have a variety of animations and interactions you can enjoy.

Are you ready to dive into a world of temptation, intrigue, and unbridled fun? Play Succubus of Aphrodisia: Ako's First Embrace, and let the seduction begin!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features multiple explicit sex scenes involving consenting adults.

name: Succubus of Aphrodisia: Ako's First Embrace

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM

short_description: Succubus of Aphrodisia is an interactable adult visual novel where you have free control of your character through multiple luscious sex scenes, as you follow the journey of Ako in her first forey into the mortal realms.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
